name: Crasy Train Puzzle Game
description:
Upload 1 : 1:38 AM (UTC+2)
- Bugged version, you can't win

Upload 2 : 2:47 AM (UTC+2)
- Bug fix
- You can remove/place tiles
- The tiles are rotated depending on the camera (Will be modified in a next build)

Upload 3 : 4:09 PM (UTC+2)
- Bug fix
- Added highlight
- Now to rotate the item you have to right click

--------------------
Controls :
- Move the camera using Arrows 
- Place tiles using Left click
- Remove tiles using Right click 
- Rotate current tile using Right click

--------------------
More level Ideas (not in the builds yet) :
- Remove all the tiles and make your path to the goal
- Remove the train and place it on the goal
- The train is in your inventory
